name: SPACE KATANA
description:
CHOOSE HOW YOUR WEAPONS WILL FAIL YOU.

A deadly cyber-virus has infected your warship. Weapons are turning off one by one, and your enemies keep warping in.

Choose the order that you lose your weapons to maximize your chances of success. Only the smartest and fastest can defeat the horde.

Will you survive?

Controls:
  • Left Mouse Button: Boost your ship around towards the mouse cursor
  • Right Mouse Button: Hold to aim, release to dash - damaging all enemies hit along the way.
  • All the rest of your weapons control themselves. Good luck!
NOTE: If the HTML5 build doesn’t work well (e.g. some screen sizes have weird UI), try downloading the windows build.
